data.title: Dataflow Models of Computation for Programming Heterogeneous Multicores
data.meta_description: The hardware complexity of modern integrated circuits keeps increasing at a steady pace. Heterogeneous Multi-Processor Systems-on-Chips (MPSoCs) integrate general-purpose processing elements, domain-specific processors, dedicated hardware accelerators, reconfigurable...
